name: Mandatory ethics training course
text:
All state officers and employees enumerated in section 84-41 shall complete an ethics training course administered by the state ethics commission as provided in this part.  For the purposes of this part, "ethics training" includes education and training in:



	(1)	The ethics laws set forth in this chapter; and
	(2)	The lobbying laws set forth in chapter 97. [L 2004, c 198, pt of §1]
